Supervisor Job at Sunrise Universal Integrated Supermarket




        
    

        
        Sunrise Universal Integrated is a subsidiary of Bond Group of Companies situated in IBadan, Oyo State with business interests in supermarkets, pharmacies, eateries and arcades.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supervisor

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo

Responsibilties
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assigning and scheduling tasks for specific employees and follow up on the result they generate.
	Complete all the operational requirements of the store
	Ensure customer needs are met, complaints resolved, and service is quick and efficient.
	Ensure all product displayed are merchandized effectively to maximize sales and profitability.
	Driving sales, standards and growth within the store.
	Building a strong rapport with the customers and employees.
	Assist the Supermarket Manager in developing and motivating a large team of colleagues.
	Ensuring all health and safety precautions are strictly adhered to.
	Ensure adherence of the Company’s code of conduct.
	Ensure staff compliance to all company’s policies.
	Closely monitor the attendance of all staff at the supermarket and preparation of the attendance summary at the end of the month.
	Ensure Standard Merchandizing and correct price tagging
	Monitor sales target & actualization review and ensure stock availability at all times.
	Confirm and report expired and about to expire items
	Any other related job assigned to you by the supermarket manager.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2 years of experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.sunrise@bondpharm.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "The Federal Medical Centre, Ikole Ekiti is a government-owned tertiary healthcare institution located in Ikole Ekiti, Ekiti State, Nigeria. It provides specialized medical services, including diagnostics, treatment, and preventive care, to the residents of Ekiti State and its surrounding regions. The hospital is equipped with modern medical facilities and offers a range of departments, including internal medicine, surgery, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynecology, and emergency care. As part of Nigeria&rsquo;s federal healthcare system, the center plays a crucial role in delivering quality and affordable healthcare services while also serving as a training ground for medical professionals.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates for the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Confidential Secretary I

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikole, Ekiti

Requirements


	Higher National Diploma in Secretarial Studies from an approved and recognised Institution and NYSC discharge or Certificate of Exemption.





Salary Grade
CONHESS 07.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates are required to submit seven (7) copies of the completed application form (including required credentials) which should be addressed and delivered by hand or posted to the address below, with the desired position marked in capital letters on the top left-hand corner of the envelope:
The Medical Director,&nbsp;
Federal Medical Centre,
PMB 5011,
Ikole-Ekiti, Ekiti State.

Click here to Download the Application Form&nbsp;(PDF)

Note


	The application form is free.&nbsp;
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for selection interview.
	Beware!!!&nbsp;The Management of the Hospital has not authorised and will not authorise any person or group of persons to collect money for employment on its behalf.

Crypto Content Creator / Social Media Manager Job at Business Insider Africa




        
    

        
        Business Insider Africa is a leading digital media platform delivering in-depth reporting, analysis, and insights on business, market, leaders, careers, and lifestyle across the African continent. As part of the global Business Insider network, we are dedicated to telling the stories that matter most to Africa’s dynamic and rapidly evolving economies.

Business Insider Africa, under the Pulse brand, is a leading digital business publication delivering engaging stories on business, innovation, markets, and leadership across Africa. Our goal is to inform, inspire, and empower Africa’s next generation of business leaders while shaping conversations on the continent and beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Position: Crypto Content Creator / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Overview


	Business Insider Africa is looking for aTech & Fintech Content Creatorwho can translate complex technology and financial topics into short, engaging, and visually appealing social media content.
	The role requires creativity, strong storytelling skills, and an understanding of what drives engagement on platforms like Instagram, X, TikTok, and LinkedIn.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong interest in emerging technologies, digital finance, and innovation across Africa. A special focus will be placed on cryptocurrency and blockchain-related stories as part of the creator’s KPIs.


Key Responsibilities


	Create and publish short-form content highlighting key developments in technology, fintech, and cryptocurrency across Africa.
	Repurpose Business Insider Africa’s website stories into platform-optimized videos, carousels, and threads.
	Identify and jump on relevant tech and fintech trends in real time.
	Work closely with the editorial team to visualize complex topics such as stablecoins, central bank digital currencies, and blockchain innovation.
	Track and analyze performance metrics across all social platforms.
	Manage online communities, respond to feedback, and encourage healthy engagement.


Performance Indicators


	Consistent output of quality tech and fintech content.
	Growth in reach, engagement, and social-driven traffic.
	Regular coverage of cryptocurrency and blockchain topics in line with agreed KPIs.


Requirements


	Proven experience creating digital or social media content in technology, business, or related sectors.
	Strong grasp of fintech, cryptocurrency, and emerging tech trends.
	Proficiency with tools like CapCut, Canva, Premiere, or After Effects.
	Understanding of social media algorithms and audience engagement best practices.
	Ability to tell stories clearly and creatively for different platforms.


Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience
	Hybrid work options
	Health insurance cover
	Group life insurance cover
	Contributory pension scheme
	Annual bonuses
	Telecommunication allowance.
